faqs.q: How many calories in a buzz ball?
faqs.a: Approximately 110 calories per standard 100 ml Buzz Ball.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one buzz ball?
faqs.a: About 14 g total carbs, mostly 12 g sugars from the flavoring.

faqs.q: Does a buzz ball have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come from alcohol and carbs.

faqs.q: How much alcohol is in a buzz ball?
faqs.a: 12% ABV in 100 ml, equivalent to about 1 standard drink.
